snippet:
User Story ID: US-09
Title: Login to account
Story: As a returning user, I want to login so I can view my account and order history.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Login form accepts valid credentials.
- Invalid login shows error message.
- Successful login redirects to My Account dashboard.

ID: US-20
Title: Log out from account
User Story: As a user, I want to log out securely when done with my session.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Logout link is available in header or account menu.
- Clicking it ends the session.
- User is redirected to the home page.

User Story ID: US-18
Title: Update account details
Story: As a logged-in user, I want to update my account information when needed.
Acceptance Criteria:
- My Account includes an edit option.
- User can modify name, email, phone.
- Changes are saved after validation.

User Story ID: US-07
Title: Guest checkout
Story: As a guest, I want to checkout without creating an account.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Guest checkout form collects full billing/shipping info.
- All required fields are validated.
- User is able to place an order without logging in.

ID: US-17
Title: Track order history
User Story: As a logged-in user, I want to see my past orders for reference.
Acceptance Criteria:
- My Account page has 'Order History' link.
- Clicking it displays previous order records.
- Order ID, date, and status are visible.

ID: US-02
Title: Search for products
User Story: As a user, I want to search for products using keywords so I can find relevant items quickly.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Search bar is present on every page.
- Search results display products matching the keyword in title or description.
- If no products are found, a 'no results' message is shown.
